hero.title: TimeChain: Empowering Skills, Not Wallets
hero.subtitle: A decentralized platform where time is currency. Trade skills, earn Time Tokens, and join a global community.

howItWorks.title: How TimeChain Works
howItWorks.individualsDesc: Earn Time Tokens (TT) by offering skills, spend them on services, or convert to fiat/crypto.
howItWorks.organizationsDesc: Hire talent for tasks using TT with automated matching and smart contracts.
howItWorks.communitiesDesc: Join a global skill-sharing economy with transparent, trustless exchanges.

features.title: Why Choose TimeChain?
features.exchangeDesc: Trade hours of work, like coding for design.
features.hiringDesc: Hire talent for tasks using Time Tokens.
features.tokensDesc: Use TT for labor and GT for governance.
features.reputationDesc: Build trust with skill verification and peer ratings.

tokenomics.title: TimeChain Tokenomics
tokenomics.ttDesc: 1 TT = 1 hour of work. Capped at 1M TT. Used for service exchanges and hiring.
tokenomics.gtDesc: Earned by staking TT. Used for voting and premium features.

roadmap.title: Our Journey
roadmap.q1Desc: Core platform with wallet, TT exchange, and job listings.
roadmap.q2Desc: Test with 1,000 users and gather feedback.
roadmap.q3Desc: Full KaiaChain integration and mobile-first features.
roadmap.q4Desc: Enhanced mobile app and partnerships with DAOs.

community.title: Join Our Global Community
community.desc: Connect with DAOs, DeFi protocols, and NGOs. Join our Discord or follow us on social media.

footer.builtOn: Built on KaiaChain | Secured by Smart Contracts
